title: Jailed Activist in Egypt Escalates Hunger Strike as COP27 Begins
description: Alaa Abd El Fattah, an activist and software developer, has been imprisoned for most of the last nine years over his condemnations of Egypt’s authoritarian government.
dc:creator: Vivian Yee
category: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
media:description: Alaa Abd El Fattah during his 2015 trial.
